channel.title: [Release] Special-PKz Client v2 [Release]
channel.description:
Special-PKz New Years Edition
My Msn Add me if you need help [Special-PKz@hotmail.co.uk]
I Have Been Working On This Client For Sometime Now
And Today I have decided to release it.
This Is Special-PKz Client v2 New Year Addition
Thing i have fixed and added
[Fetures]
Added Godwars Monsters added new jframes etc Added all custom Wepons to this client like dragon whip Dragon defender Etc Added New Compiler Contains A High, And a Low Detailed client. Added High Detail Added Low Detail Recolored Jframe Added New Background Added Model Button Added Screenshot Button Added Censor Button Added Forum button Added Server Status list Added Item Lists Added music Only 3 songs Removed ip address from the login title Has new hair and clothe renders Monsters i Have Added revanents, titans, and summoning monsters, Godwars Monsters, Lots More.
Now For The Pictures
[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo342/Special_album/Special-PkzNewYearAddition.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo342/Special_album/Special-PKzV2client.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo342/Special_album/QUIT.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo342/Special_album/MUSIC.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo342/Special_album/LISTS.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo342/Special_album/JFRAMES.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo342/Special_album/FORUMS.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo342/Special_album/CENCORS.jpg[/img]
Server Link
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mz2m3mzymun
Credits
Foxy08 For Client Base
Skillersdream For Coding It All
To Let You Guyz No I am Special Pkz
I Will Be Creating A Brand New Client On A new client base.
